data.name: 模拟驾考二
data.detailed_description:
A game that simulates driving,
"Simulation driving II is also called automobile driving simulation, or virtual automobile driving. Simulation driving allows the experimenter to drive in a virtual driving environment,
Make them feel the visual, auditory and somatosensory car driving experience close to the real effect. The driving simulation effect is lifelike, energy-saving, safe and economical, and is not limited by time, climate and site,
The advantages of high driving training efficiency and short training cycle are widely used in new model development and driving training. "
data.about_the_game:
A game that simulates driving,

data.short_description: Simulated driving test 2 is an alternative simulated driving game. The picture is very unique and the game is also very unique. Players who like to hunt for novelty must not miss it. Come and experience it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4代 或 AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 无
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 7代
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 无
